parameters.content:
## Google Sheet Listens for Google Form Leads

- Create a unique Id
- Add Unique Id to new lead

## Enrich Lead with Exploria API

* LinkedIn Profile Details
* Company Size 
* Job Title, etc.
## Segment based on Company Size and send Gmail message to our appropriate sales team

= New SMB Lead

Name: {{ $('Clean Up for Email').item.json.full_name }}
Job Title: {{ $('Clean Up for Email').item.json.company_role }}
Company Size: {{ $('Clean Up for Email').item.json.company_size }}
Primary Goal: "{{ $('Clean Up for Email').item.json.primary_goal }}"
LinkedIn: View Profile
Lead Record: View in Google Sheets

Sales Approach

This SMB lead is looking to streamline operations. They value speed and efficiency. In your outreach, focus on quick wins and how you can save them time immediately.

= New Mid-Market Lead

ðŸ“ˆ New Mid-Market Lead! ðŸ“ˆ
Name: {{ $json.full_name }}
Job Title: {{ $json.company_role }}
Company Size: {{ $json.company_size }}
Primary Goal: "{{ $json.primary_goal }}"
LinkedIn: View Profile
Lead Record: View in Google Sheets

Sales Approach

This Mid-Market lead is likely focused on scalable growth and improving team efficiency. They will be interested in clear ROI and how your solutions can integrate with their existing processes. In your outreach, prepare to discuss how automation can support a growing team and drive measurable business results.

Company Size: {{ $('Clean Up for Email').item.json.company_size }}

Lead Record: View in Google Sheets

Sales Approach

This high-value Enterprise lead requires a strategic approach. The conversation should focus on long-term value, data integrity, security, and scalability. Be prepared for a longer sales cycle and discussions with multiple stakeholders from different departments (e.g., IT, Finance, Operations).

parameters.subject: New Lead Missing Enrichment
